notes.text: PlanningCalendar-accessibility for special dates & appointments
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Week numbers are now displayed
sap.ui.unified.FileUploader - new aggregation "FileUploaderXHRSettings" added
unified.FileUploader: Allow processing of files before upload using interface
unified.FileUploader: valueStateText property introduced
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
ShellHeader Layout fixed
ShellHeader Layout fixed
sap.m.DatePicker: Submit empty input value while picker open now works correctly
sap.m.Menu: has focus now
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - appointment row focus outline covers all 4 sides for High Contrast Black & High Contrast White themes.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - when theme changes, the year picker is not shown anymore.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: direct navigation to date bugs fixed
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: selecting appointments fires event in OneMonth view on small screen size
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Adding selected dates to the calendar does not steal the focus from other elements
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Select event now has correct event source
sap.ui.unified.ColorPicker: Theme parameters improvement
sap.ui.unified.Menu: Context menu will now flip of there is not enough space on the opening side
sap.ui.unified.Menu: Repositioning in RTL after opening removed
sap.ui.unified.Menu: focus correctly set on item with input field
sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: single interval selection highlights the right dates
unified.Calendar: make documentation for setMin/MaxDate visible
unified.FileUploader: drag and drop behavior fixed
